members.joinCircumstances: Captain and founder of the crew.
First mate and vice-captain, Shanks' most trusted crew member.
Member of the crew, known for always eating meat.

keyMoments.title: Red Hair Pirates First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The Red Hair Pirates appear in Foosha Village, where they have been staying for some time and befriended young Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of the most important pirate crews in the world, led by a future Yonko.

keyMoments.title: Red Hair Pirates Don't Fight Higuma
keyMoments.description: Despite being humiliated by Higuma, Shanks and his crew laugh it off and don't retaliate.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's maturity and that they don't need to prove themselves through violence.

keyMoments.title: Red Hair Pirates Leave for Grand Line
keyMoments.description: The crew departs Foosha Village to continue their journey on the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of their stay in the East Blue and their departure from Luffy's life.

ships.description: The Red Hair Pirates' ship, shown briefly as they depart from Foosha Village.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with two crossed swords behind it and three red slash marks across the left eye socket
